description.name: Ratchet Bar Clamp 750mm / 30 in.
description.long_desc:
Ścisk/rozpierak stolarski jednoręczny 750 mm

Wysokiej jakości jednoręczny ścisk stolarski renomowanej marki GEKO. System szybkiego przesuwu umożliwia obsługę ścisku jedną ręką. Posiada możliwość przełożenia górnej szczęki i używanie ścisku jak rozpieraka.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • wysoka jakość wykonania
  • system szybkiego przesuwu - łatwa obsługa jedną ręką
  • plastikowe nakładki na szczęki zabezpieczające ściskany materiał przed uszkodzeniem
  • po przełożeniu szczek może być używany jak rozpieraka

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Głębokość ścisku: 60 mm
  • Zakres roboczy przy ściskaniu: 0 - 750 mm
  • Zakres roboczy przy rozpieraniu: 140 – 910 mm

description.name: Water cannon with bearing valva 2 inch
description.long_desc:
A long fire nozzle designed to produce a compact and dispersed stream of water. It is adapted to fire hoses with a diameter of 2 ”(52mm) with a fire connector. Equipped with a solid ball valve for immediate shutdown and regulation of water flow.


Product features:
it has a solid, smoothly operating ball valve that allows you to quickly give or cut off the water stream
equipped with long nozzles ensuring a firm grip of the device
adapted to work with fire hoses with a diameter of 2 "(52mm) with a standard fire connector
enables the production of a compact and dispersed stream of water

description.name: Router Bits Shank 6mm 12pcs
description.long_desc:
Zestaw frezów kształtowych do drewna 12-elementowy

Zestaw 12 frezów kształtowych do drewna pozwalające na precyzyjną obróbkę materiału. Ostrza ze stali szybkotnącej HSS pozwalają na użycie frezów do obróbki drewna litego, płyty wiórowej, MDF i innych materiałów drewnopochodnych. Zastosowane łożyska, zmniejszają opór toczenia, dlatego frezy idealnie nadają się do kształtowania obłych materiałów. Całość umieszczono w praktycznej drewnianej walizce, gdzie każdy frez ma swoje podpisane miejsce.

Cechy produktu

  • 6 frezów wyposażonych w łożyska
  • ostrza wykonane ze stali szybkotnącej HSS
  • frezy osadzone na trzpieniu o średnicy 6mm
  • całość zestawu w poręcznym drewnianym pudełku

Elementy zestawu:

  • frez DIA-12.7 R-6.3
  • frez DIA-22 R-6.3
  • frez DIA-12.7 ANGLE-14
  • frez DIA-32 ANGLE-45
  • frez DIA-12.7
  • frez DIA-16
  • frez DIA-22 R-6.3
  • frez DIA-12
  • frez DIA-6
  • frez DIA-28.6 R-9.5
  • frez DIA-12.7 ANGLE-90°
  • frez DIA-25 R-4
  • klucz imbusowy
  • drewniane podełko

description.name: Tool pocket type 1
description.long_desc:
Tool pouch made of durable abrasion-resistant plastic material. It features 5 pockets for convenient carrying of various tools and accessories such as screws, nails, bolts, etc. Additionally, the pouch is equipped with an integrated hammer holder.


Product features:



  • Made of high-quality abrasion-resistant plastic material

  • Resistant to abrasion

  • Optimal pocket size for comfortable carrying of various tools and accessories

  • Integrated hammer holder

  • Perfect for carpentry, construction, assembly work, etc.


 


Check the product presentation on our Youtube channel:

description.name: Bent hose crimping pliers set
description.long_desc:
Zestaw szczypiec zaciskowych wygiętych do przewodów elastycznych. Do przewodów o średnicy do 63.5 mm. Za pomocą szczypiec można zapobiec wypłynięciu płynów z przewodów chłodniczych, hamulcowych, itp.

Cechy produktu

  • małe szczypce (1/8" - 5/16"), średnie szczypce (1/2" - 3/4"), duże szczypce (3/4" - 2 1/2")
  • wykonane z wysokiej jakości tworzywa sztucznego
  • blokada za pomocą pierścienia

description.name: Morse pliers 5"-125mm
description.long_desc:
Szczypce zaciskowe typu Morse znajdą zastosowanie w firmach hydraulicznych, zakładach spawalniczych itp. Dolna samozaciskowa szczęka umożliwia mocne zaciśnięcie szczęk na wybranym elemencie, zapobiegając jego ślizganiu i przemieszczaniu.

Charakterystyka produktu

  • śruba regulująca rozstaw szczęk
  • mechanizm zwalniający umożliwia łatwe otwarcie szczęk
  • wygodna ergonomiczna rękojeść

Dane techniczne

  • Rozmiar szczypiec: 125mm / 5"
  • Materiał wykonania: stal stopowa chromowo-wanadowa CrV

description.name: Profile forming pliers 210mm (150x35mm)
description.long_desc:
Straight pliers 150x30mm intended for manual shaping and bending of metal sheets. They are perfect for installing metal profiles under plasterboard, making roofing, and installing metal door frames.


Product Features:



  • straight pliers equipped with jaws measuring 150x30mm

  • ribbed jaws on the inside ensure a firm grip of the sheet

  • handle with non-slip soft plastic pads

description.name: Inverter generator 3HP 2KW
description.long_desc:
Professional Inverter Generator equipped with a petrol engine with a capacity of 119cc and 3 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate a peak power of 2000W. The continuous power the generator can handle is 1800W for one 230V socket, and when using two sockets, the output power is divided between them.


Inverter generators operate on slightly different principles than traditional frame generators. The main and most significant difference is the much more advanced technology, known as a smoothed sine wave. One of the most important elements of the generator is the inverter, which initiates the production of high-quality, clean current, which is then converted into direct current in subsequent stages. It is thanks to the inverter and automatic voltage regulation (AVR) that it performs exceptionally well when powering devices sensitive to voltage changes. The 10-liter fuel tank allows for uninterrupted operation (at half load) for approximately 9 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made using high-quality components and materials

  • The inverter combined with a high-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR) maintains a constant voltage level, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for all household appliances, even those sensitive to slight voltage changes such as computers, televisions, refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 3 HP engine provides a maximum power output of 2000W and a continuous power of 1800W

  • The alternator features copper windings

  • Under half load, the unit can operate for 9 hours on a single tank of fuel

  • 2 x 230V sockets

  • Manual start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • Quiet operation is ensured by a well-matched muffler and very good damping (95 dB)

  • 10-liter fuel tank equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: QL2000ix

  • Engine Type: Single-cylinder, 4-stroke, overhead valve (OHV)

  • Engine Power: 3.0 HP

  • Displacement: 119 cm3

  • Rotation Speed: 4000 rpm

  • Cooling System: Fan

  • Start Type: Manual

  • Generator Type: Single-phase

  • Rated Voltage: 230V

  • Frequency: 50 Hz

  • Rated Current: 7.82 A

  • Ignition System: Electronic

  • Sockets: 2 x 230 V

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 10 L

  • Oil Pan Capacity: 0.38 L

  • Engine Oil: 4-stroke engine oil 10W40 or SAE30

  • Max Power: 2000 W, S2 operation mode, 5 min

  • Rated Power: 1800 W

  • Power Factor: 1.0

  • Continuous Operation (50% rated load): 8 hours

  • Performance Class: G1

  • Quality Class: B

  • Protection Class: IP23M

  • Weight: 21.5 kg

  • Guaranteed Sound Power Level: According to Directives 2000/14/EC, 2005/88/EC

  • 95 dB(A)

  • Max Operating Height above Sea Level: 1000 m

  • Length x Width x Height: 460 x 380 x 440 mm

  • Packaging Dimensions: 490 x 395 x 470 mm


Check out the device test on YouTube!:

description.name: Inverter generator 7HP 3,5KW
description.long_desc:
Professional inverter power generator equipped with a combustion engine with a capacity of 212cc and a power of 7 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate momentary maximum power of 3500W. The continuous power that the generator can handle is 3200W for one 230V socket, in case of using two sockets, the output power is divided between the two sockets.


Inverter generators operate on slightly different principles than traditional frame generators. The main and most significant difference is a much more advanced technology, known as a smoothed sine wave. One of the most important components of the generator is the inverter converter; it is responsible for initiating the production of high-quality, clean electricity, which is then converted into direct current in subsequent stages. It is thanks to the inverter and automatic voltage regulation (AVR) that it performs exceptionally well when powering devices sensitive to voltage changes. The fuel tank with a capacity of 12 liters allows uninterrupted operation (at half load) for about 9 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Constructed using high-quality components and materials

  • The inverter converter, in combination with a high-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR), maintains a constant voltage, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for all household appliances, even those sensitive to minor voltage changes such as computers, televisions, refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 7 HP engine allows for a maximum power output of 3500W and a continuous power of 3200W

  • The alternator has copper windings

  • At half load, the device can operate for 9 hours on a single fuel tank

  • 2 x 230V sockets

  • Manual start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • The device operates quietly, thanks to a properly selected muffler and very good damping (96 dB)

  • The 12-liter fuel tank is equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: QL3500ig

  • Engine Type: 1-cylinder, 4-stroke, overhead valve OHV

  • Engine Power: 7.0 HP

  • Displacement: 212 cm3

  • Rotation Speed: 3800 rpm

  • Cooling System: Fan

  • Starting System: Manual

  • Generator (Alternator): Single-phase

  • Rated Voltage: 230V

  • Frequency: 50 Hz

  • Ignition System: Electronic

  • Sockets: 2 x 230 V, 1x 12V DC 8A

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 12 liters

  • Engine Oil Capacity: 0.6 liters

  • Engine Oil: 4-stroke engine oil 10W40 or SAE30

  • Maximum Power: 3500 W, S2 operation mode, 5 minutes

  • Rated Power: 3200 W

  • Power Factor: 1.0

  • Continuous Operation (50% of rated load): 9 hours

description.short_desc:
Professional inverter power generator equipped with a combustion engine with a capacity of 212cc and a power of 7 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate momentary maximum power of 3500W. The continuous power that the generator can handle is 3200W for one 230V socket, in case of using two sockets, the output power is divided between the two sockets.


Inverter generators operate on slightly different principles than traditional frame generators. The main and most significant difference is a much more advanced technology, known as a smoothed sine wave. One of the most important components of the generator is the inverter converter; it is responsible for initiating the production of high-quality, clean electricity, which is then converted into direct current in subsequent stages. It is thanks to the inverter and automatic voltage regulation (AVR) that it performs exceptionally well when powering devices sensitive to voltage changes. The fuel tank with a capacity of 12 liters allows uninterrupted operation (at half load) for about 9 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Constructed using high-quality components and materials

  • The inverter converter, in combination with a high-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR), maintains a constant voltage, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for all household appliances, even those sensitive to minor voltage changes such as computers, televisions, refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 7 HP engine allows for a maximum power output of 3500W and a continuous power of 3200W

  • The alternator has copper windings

  • At half load, the device can operate for 9 hours on a single fuel tank

  • 2 x 230V sockets

  • Manual start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • The device operates quietly, thanks to a properly selected muffler and very good damping (96 dB)

  • The 12-liter fuel tank is equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: QL3500ig

  • Engine Type: 1-cylinder, 4-stroke, overhead valve OHV

  • Engine Power: 7.0 HP

  • Displacement: 212 cm3

  • Rotation Speed: 3800 rpm

  • Cooling System: Fan

  • Starting System: Manual

  • Generator (Alternator): Single-phase

  • Rated Voltage: 230V

  • Frequency: 50 Hz

  • Ignition System: Electronic

  • Sockets: 2 x 230 V, 1x 12V DC 8A

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 12 liters

  • Engine Oil Capacity: 0.6 liters

  • Engine Oil: 4-stroke engine oil 10W40 or SAE30

  • Maximum Power: 3500 W, S2 operation mode, 5 minutes

  • Rated Power: 3200 W

  • Power Factor: 1.0

  • Continuous Operation (50% of rated load): 9 hours

  • Protection Class: IP23M

  • Weight: 34.5 kg

  • Guaranteed Acoustic Power Level: According to Directives 2000/14/EC, 2005/88/EC

  • 96 db(A)

  • Maximum Altitude of Operation: 1000 m

description.name: Electric ceramic heater 2KW
description.long_desc:
2kW electric heater. It is equipped with a ceramic heating element which, combined with a strong airflow, ensures quick heating of rooms such as shops, workshops, garages, households, etc. It has two switches that allow you to set the heater power and set the desired temperature after which the device will stop heating when the ambient temperature drops below the set temperature, the device will turn on again. The insulated handle allows you to safely carry the heater even moments after it is turned off.


Product characteristics:



  • heating power of 2 kW

  • long-life ceramic heating element

  • two knobs - one for setting the heater's power, the other is a thermostat knob for setting the temperature after reaching which the heater will stop heating

  • ergonomic handle for carrying the heater

  • does not produce fumes or unpleasant odors, especially recommended for closed rooms

  • a safety switch disconnects the heater when it is accidentally tipped over


Technical specifications:


Heating power: 2 kW


Power supply: 230V ~50Hz


Heating power: 25 / 1000 / 2000W


Thermostat: Yes


Recommended room area: 30m2


Protection class: I


IP protection: IPX0


Weight: 1.5 kg


Length x Width x Height: 235 x 130 x 285 mm

description.name: Electric ceramic warmer 2KW
description.long_desc:
Nagrzewnica elektryczna o mocy 2kW. Wyposażona została w ceramiczny element grzejny co w połączeniu z silnym nawiewem zapewnia szybkie ogrzewanie pomieszczeń takich jak sklepy, warsztaty, garaże, gospodarstwa domowe itp. Posiada dwa przełączniki pozwalające ustawić moc nagrzewnicy oraz ustawić żądaną temperaturę po osiągnięciu której urządzenie przerwie ogrzewania, gdy temperatura otoczenia spadnie poniżej zadanej temperatury urządzenie ponownie się załączy. Izolowany uchwyt pozwala w bezpieczny sposób przenosić nagrzewnice nawet chwile po jej wyłączeniu.


Charakterystyka produktu:



  • moc grzewcza na poziomie 2kW

  • ceramiczny element grzejny o długiej żywotności

  • dwa pokrętła - jedno przeznaczone do ustawienia mocy nagrzewnicy, drugie to pokrętło termostatu umożliwiające ustawienie temperatury po osiągnięciu której nagrzewnica przerwie ogrzewanie

  • ergonomiczny uchwyt do przenoszenia nagrzewnicy

  • nie wytwarza oparów oraz nieprzyjemnych zapachów, szczególnie polecana do pomieszczeń zamkniętych

  • wyłącznik bezpieczeństwa rozłącza nagrzewnice w momencie jej przypadkowego przewrócenia


Specyfikacja techniczna:


Moc grzewcza: 2 kW


Napięcie zasilania: 230V ~50Hz


Moc grzewcza: 25 / 1000 / 2000W


Termostat: Tak


Zalecana powierzchnia pomieszczenia: 30m2


Klasa ochrony: I


Ochrona IP: IPX0


Waga: 1,6 kg


Długość x Szerokość x Wysokość: 235 x 130 x 285 mm

description.name: Electric industrial heater 2KW
description.long_desc:
Industrial Electric Heater 2KW


An industrial electric heater with a 2KW power rating is an invaluable tool that provides efficient heating, comfort, and safety during use. With two power levels, utilizing two heating elements, you can adjust the heat intensity to your needs. Powered by 230V voltage and operating at 50Hz, this heater offers reliability, durability, and quiet operation.


It's worth noting that the heater is equipped with automatic shutdown in case of tipping, which is an important safety feature. Additionally, the fan function makes it useful throughout the year, not just during the winter season. The thermostat allows precise control of the heat level, adapting it to current needs.


The solid metal construction with two convenient handles makes it easy to move the heater, and the adjustable angle of the air outlet with a lock provides user-friendly operation.


The first potentiometer regulates the operating modes:



  • First mode - fan-only operation without heating

  • Second mode - heating at half power (using one heating element)

  • Third mode - heating at full power (using both heating elements)


The second potentiometer is used for temperature control.


Key Product Features:



  • Solid metal construction with two handles

  • Automatic shutdown in case of tipping

  • Two potentiometers for regulating heater mode and temperature

  • Fan function

  • Adjustable angle of the air outlet with a lock

  • Quiet operation


Technical Specifications:



  • Power: 2KW

  • Power Supply: 230V~50Hz

  • Dimensions: 27 x 35.5 x 34cm (width x length x height)

  • Length of Power Cable: 130cm

  • Ventilation Function

  • Automatic Shutdown in Case of Tipping

  • Thermostat

  • 3 Power Levels: 25-2000W

Powered by 230V voltage and operating at 50Hz, this heater offers reliability, durability, and quiet operation.


It's worth noting that the heater is equipped with automatic shutdown in case of tipping, which is an important safety feature. Additionally, the fan function makes it useful throughout the year, not just during the winter season. The thermostat allows precise control of the heat level, adapting it to current needs.


The solid metal construction with two convenient handles makes it easy to move the heater, and the adjustable angle of the air outlet with a lock provides user-friendly operation.


The first potentiometer regulates the operating modes:



  • First mode - fan-only operation without heating

  • Second mode - heating at half power (using one heating element)

  • Third mode - heating at full power (using both heating elements)


The second potentiometer is used for temperature control.


Key Product Features:



  • Solid metal construction with two handles

  • Automatic shutdown in case of tipping

  • Two potentiometers for regulating heater mode and temperature

  • Fan function

  • Adjustable angle of the air outlet with a lock

  • Quiet operation


Technical Specifications:



  • Power: 2KW

  • Power Supply: 230V~50Hz

  • Dimensions: 27 x 35.5 x 34cm (width x length x height)

  • Length of Power Cable: 130cm

  • Ventilation Function

  • Automatic Shutdown in Case of Tipping

  • Thermostat

  • 3 Power Levels: 25-2000W
